moves.name: X Sp. Def
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Over the Wall!
moves.effect: Increases the user’s move gauge by two. Raises the user’s accuracy. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

syncMove.name: Crazy Cool Rock Tomb
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is flinching.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Sand Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a sandstorm.

passives.name: Aggravation 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.
